page.title: 13CAROLE'S DAY PART 2
page.content: THE AFTERNOON IS AN INFORMAL SESSION. TODAY WE HAVE BEEN GIVEN CERTAIN INFORMATION ABOUT A ROAD SAFETY POSTER WE ARE TO DESIGN.WE COMMENCE BY GETTING OUR IDEAS DOWN IN ROUGH BEFORE WE START THE ACTUAL DESIGN.WE NOW GET READY FOR GAMES,WE FORM TWO TEAMS TO PLAY ROUNDERS,MR BALL OUR HEADTEACHER IS IN ONE TEAM AND MRS GATWARD IN THE OTHER.WE WIN SIX FIVE.AT AFTERNOON BREAK WE ARE ABLE TO BUY CRISPS OR BISCUITS FROM THE SCHOOL TUCK SHOP. IN THE LAST HALF HOUR AFTER BREAK WE COMPLETE ANY UNFINISHED WORK AND THEN MR BALL READS A STORY FOR THE LAST TEN MINUTES.IT IS HOME TIME AT 3.10PM AND THE BUS TAKES ME HOME.WE HAVE AN EVENING MEAL TOGETHER AS DAD WORKS ON THE FARM. I WATCH TELEVISION IN THE EVENING AND FINALLY POP INTO BED AT ABOUT 9 00PM I AM 8 YEARS OF AGE.
